overview: A reclusive ogre lives alone in a large garden where he spends his days eating and gardening. One day, he meets a tiny woman who has fallen from the back of a swallow. An unusual friendship is born but their nature takes over again: TommeLise wants to leave while the ogre's appetite wakes up.

production_companies.name: Ecole nationale supérieure des Arts Décoratifs

title: Thumbelina and the Ogre
